name: 2015 Big Buck Deer Hunt: Unlimited White Tail Hunting Season Action FREE
name_original: 2015 Big Buck Deer Hunt: Unlimited White Tail Hunting Season Action FREE
description:
Do you love hunting?..................Is this something that gives you pleasure?

Stop your search then, download this thrilling deer hunting game and hunt these deer, hoping around in the jungle.

How to Play:

Select your gun, aim at one of the running deer and shoot. You have to shot a target number of deer in given time in order to clear the level.

Controls:

Tilt your device to aim and tap the screen to shoot.

Features:

• Different Guns to choose from
• Universal app, play in HD on any iOS device, including iPads
• Tight and fast paced gameplay
• Amazing looking doodle graphics
• Share your scores on Facebook or Twitter
• Supports GameCenter

Its a must have game in your iphone if you are passionate about hunting and shooting games. Enjoy!
